com.amazon.speech.json

Class SpeechletRequestEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.json.SpeechletRequestEnvelope

  • public final class SpeechletRequestEnvelope
extends java.lang.Object
    Envelope to wrap the various parameters of a Speechlet invocation.
    See Also:
    Speechlet, IntentRequest, Session
